casebody.data:
Daniel Joseph CONNOLLY v. C. H. LOONEY, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth, Kansas. No. 6067. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. March 25, 1959. Richard B. Burns, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Wilbur G. Leonard, U. S. Atty., and E. Edward Johnson, Asst. U. S. Atty., Topeka, Kan., and George E. Peabody, Asst. U. S. Atty., Wichita, Kan., for ap-pellee.

Before MURRAH, LEWIS and BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on ground appeal was moot.
